price: Hakika wale ambao neno la Mola wako Mlezi limekwisha thibitika juu yao, hawataamini,
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ حَقَّتۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: Hakika wale iliyo kwisha pita juu yao hukumu ya kuwa wao ni makafiri, kwa kujuulikana inadi yao na chuki zao, hawatoamini hata ukijihangaisha vipi nafsi yako kuwakinaisha.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ḥaqqat ʿalayhim kalimatu rabbika lā yu'minūna
